title: John Benson (Minnesota politician)
text:
John H. Benson (born July 30, 1943) is a <a href="Minnesota">Minnesota</a> politician and former member of the <a href="Minnesota%20House%20of%20Representatives">Minnesota House of Representatives</a>. A member of the <a href="Minnesota%20Democratic%E2%80%93Farmer%E2%80%93Labor%20Party">Minnesota Democratic–Farmer–Labor Party</a> (DFL), he represented District 44B, which includes portions of western <a href="Hennepin%20County%2C%20Minnesota">Hennepin County</a> in the <a href="Twin%20Cities">Twin Cities</a> metropolitan area.
Minnesota House of Representatives.
Benson was first elected in 2006 and re-elected in 2008, 2010, and 2012. He announced on December 18, 2013 that he will not run for re-election in 2014.
